articles.title: Tesla recalls nearly 500,000 cars due to bonnets that could fly open, faulty cameras - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Tesla will offer free repairs on the nearly half million American cars involved in the two recalls.
articles.content:
Nearly 500,000 Tesla cars are being recalled in the USA, that country's National Highway Traffic Safety Administration announced this month.
Of the two recalls issued by the NHTSA, the more immediat… [+1442 chars]
